title: Authme插件问题
author: BH.xiaobai
txt_content: 玩家登入后，不进行任何操作有时候还是回到默认出生点，怎么搞

replies.author: 夜斗km
replies.txt_content:
BH.xiaobai 发表于 2019-8-17 23:10
wtf is that?
打开插件文件夹，打开ESS配置文件夹，打开config
找到“respawn-listener-priority:”后面改成highest
在你决定的出生点输入/setspawn Defult与/setspawn Builder
即可

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Jeansou
replies.txt_content:
ForceSpawnLocOnJoin:
            # If enabled, every player that spawn in one of the world listed in
            # "ForceSpawnLocOnJoin.worlds" will be teleported to the spawnpoint after successful
            # authentication. The quit location of the player will be overwritten.
            # This is different from "teleportUnAuthedToSpawn" that teleport player
            # to the spawnpoint on join.
            enabled: true
            # WorldNames where we need to force the spawn location
            # Case-sensitive!
            worlds: 
            - world
            - world_nether
            - world_the_end复制代码把enabled设为false

replies.author: BH.xiaobai
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-17 20:12
是不是加了tplogin插件？

或者检查一下config.yml里的ForceSpawnLocOnJoin
没有加tplogin

replies.author: 龙岩是啊
replies.txt_content: 可能是ess插件配置文件的出生点优先级问题，你可以尝试修改ess配置文件的spawn优先度

replies.txt_content:
